song_lyrics: Sakhī! Ad‍bhut bhāgya chhe āpṇā, Puruṣhottam prāṇ ādhār;
Je chhe parāpār, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 1
Jene neti neti nigam kahe, jenī kīrti kare chhe uchchār;
Jene vadan hajār, te Prabhujī padhārīyā... ° 2
Jenā darshan durlabh devne, dhare Shankar jenu dhyān;
Kare guṇgān, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 3
Jene Shāradā varṇave sarvadā, Muni Nārad Sanak samān;
Shobhe chhe nidān, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 4
Jene arathe jogī jap tap kare, kare aṣhṭānga yog abhyās;
Vasī vanvās, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 5
Jog yagna kare jene pāmavā, koī sukh tajī le sanyās;
Dile thaī udās, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 6
Bhaje Prakṛuti Puruṣh bhalā bhāvthī, paṇ samaje nahi jeno sār;
Pāme nahi pār, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 7
Brahmā Viṣhṇu ne bhav te bhūlā paḍe, jeno na karī shake nirdhār;
Ke kevo ākār, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 8
Jenā tan ek romnā tejmā, koṭi sūrya shashī līn thāy;
Na jarīye jaṇāy, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 9
Chhek romtaṇā ek chhīdramā, āvā vishva asankhya samāy;
Gaṇyā na gaṇāy, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 10
Moṭā mukta bhaje jene bhāvthī, bhaje Akṣharpuruṣh anek;
Dharī draḍh ṭek, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 11
Jenī tulya bījo nav jāṇīe, enā jevā to e ja chhe ek;
Chhate jotā chhek, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 12
Jenī āgnā thakī juo jagatmā, Shashī Sūraj fare chhe ākāsh;
Kare chhe prakāsh, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 13
Mahāsāgar marjādāmā rahe, jene pāḷya nathī eke pās;
Vase sthir vās, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 14
Megh vṛuṣhṭi kare ākhī sṛuṣhṭimā, te to jehnā hukam pramāṇ;
Karī nirmāṇ, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 15
Sukhkārī Vihārīlālajī, je chhe sundar Shyām sujāṇ;
Sadā sukh khāṇ, te Prabhujī padhāriyā... ° 16
title: Sakhī! Ad‍bhut bhāgya chhe āpṇā

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-634: Acharya Viharilalji Maharaj

Category: Prapti ne Mahimana Pad
